formula: E.g.f.: 2 - 2/Q(0), where Q(k)= 1 - (2*k+1)*(2*k+2)/x + 1/x*(2*k+1)*(2*k+2)/Q(k+1); (continued fraction). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, May 01 2013
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
